thread.title: Cristiano Ronaldo Leads Al Nasr FC to Victory in Saudi Pro League 2023 - Archyde
thread.title_full: Cristiano Ronaldo Leads Al Nasr FC to Victory in Saudi Pro League 2023 - Archyde

author: archyde
title: Cristiano Ronaldo Leads Al Nasr FC to Victory in Saudi Pro League 2023 - Archyde
text: 2023-12-31 03:40:43 Cristiano Ronaldo and Al Nassr FC won their last match in Saudi Pro League 2023. In Saturday’s match, they beat Al Tawoon FC by four goals to one. Captain Cristiano Ronaldo also scored for the team. 38-year-old Cristiano Ronaldo has become the top scorer of 2023 after scoring a goal in the match. The Portugal captain, who returned from the 2022 Qatar World Cup with his head bowed, ends 2023 with his head held high. Cristiano’s arrival from Manchester United to Al Nasser FC was not in vain. Kerala Blasters Jeakson Singh: Win against Mohun Bagan; But the yellow army is disappointed Ronaldo reached this achievement by surpassing the young players of world football. PSG’s French superstar Kylian Mbappe and Bayern Munich’s English star Harry Kane came second in the list. Both scored 52 goals this year. Manchester City’s Norwegian striker Erling Haaland is third with 50 goals. Cristiano is also at the top of the Golden Boot list in the Saudi Pro League. The player scored 20 goals in 19 matches played in the league. The player was not far behind in scoring goals. Cristiano assisted 9 goals this season. Al Nasr FC is second in the points table in the league. They are 7 points ahead of Al Hilal FC in the first place. FIFA rule will backfire on Cristiano Ronaldo; The top scorer status of 2023 is likely to be lost In 2023, Ronaldo scored more than fifty goals, while his rival, Argentine superstar Lionel Messi, scored only 28 goals in 44 matches. The year that Messi also changed clubs is passing. Messi moved from French club PSG to Inter Miami. Messi scored 11 goals in Major League Soccer for the American club. There is a short break for matches in the Saudi Pro League. Teams are preparing for Asia Cup 2023. League matches will be held in February. Until then, Cristiano Ronaldo will have a holiday. There is a small gap in Major League Soccer where Messi is playing. Two titles, the Ballon d’Or and Argentina’s victory over Brazil; What happened in Lionel Messi’s career in 2023? Cristiano and his team won the match against Al Tawan. Although it was Al Tawoon who scored the first goal in the 13th minute, Al Nasr FC scored four goals and scored a resounding victory. Apart from Cristiano Ronaldo, Marcelo Brosovic, Aymeric Laporte and Otavio scored for Al Nasser FC.
